path.style: fill: #ff0; stroke: #000; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 1.5px;

polygon.style: fill: #fff; stroke: #000; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 1.5px;

path.style: fill: #f0f; stroke: #000; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 1.5px;

polygon.style: fill: aqua; stroke: #000; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-width: 1.5px;
